setattribute.xpath: /recipes/recipe [ starts-with(@name, 'window03Wood') or (contains(@name, 'candleTableLightPlayer')) or (contains(@name, 'woodFurnitureBlockVariantHelper')) or (contains(@name, 'woodSignBlockVariantHelper')) or (contains(@name, 'looseBoardsTrapBlock1x1')) or (contains(@name, 'looseBoardsTrapBlock3x3')) or (contains(@name, 'looseBoardsTrapPlate1x1')) or (contains(@name, 'window03Wood')) or (contains(@name, 'woodBars')) or (contains(@name, 'woodBarsCentered')) or (contains(@name, 'woodCatwalkBlockVariantHelper')) or (contains(@name, 'woodFenceRailingTrellisSheetBlockVariantHelper')) or (contains(@name, 'woodHatch1_v1')) or (contains(@name, 'woodLogPillar100')) or (contains(@name, 'woodPlate')) or (contains(@name, 'woodCTRPlate')) or (contains(@name, 'woodPole')) or (contains(@name, 'woodStairs25')) or (contains(@name, 'cntSecureStorageChest')) or (contains(@name, 'cntWoodFurnitureBlockVariantHelper')) and not(contains(@craft_area, 'forge')) and not(contains(@craft_area, 'campfire')) and not(contains(@craft_area, 'survivalCampfireJT')) and not(contains(@craft_area, 'cementMixer')) and not(contains(@craft_area, 'tablesaw')) and not(contains(@craft_area, 'chemistryStation')) and not(contains(@craft_area, 'workbench')) and not(contains(@craft_area, 'personalWorkbenchJT')) and not(contains(@craft_area, 'tanningRackJT')) ]
setattribute.name: craft_area
